name: ADOPTION OF Helene Ivy HILTON a/k/a Helene Norris. Appeal of Charles Ernest BUZBY, III

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: ADOPTION OF Helene Ivy HILTON a/k/a Helene Norris. Appeal of Charles Ernest BUZBY, III.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Christopher H. Gadsden, Duffield Ashmead, III, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Pepper, Hamilton & Scheetz, Paul Maloney, Louis C. Washburn, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
369 A.2d 728
ADOPTION OF Helene Ivy HILTON a/k/a Helene Norris. Appeal of Charles Ernest BUZBY, III.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 15, 1976.
Decided Feb. 28, 1977.
Christopher H. Gadsden, Duffield Ashmead, III, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Pepper, Hamilton & Scheetz, Paul Maloney, Louis C. Washburn, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
